trans-unit.target: Der SignTool-Auftrag wird mit {count} Dateien signiert.
trans-unit.note: {count} is the number of files to be signed. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: The certificate is not yet time valid.
trans-unit.target: Das Zertifikat ist noch nicht gültig.
trans-unit.note: A certificate has a validity period with start and end dates. "not yet time valid" means that the start date is in the future.
{fileName} is a file name and {error} is verbose output from a tool. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.
{fileName} is a file name and {output} is verbose output from a tool. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.target: Der Mage-Auftrag wird mit {count} Dateien signiert.
trans-unit.note: {Locked="Mage"} is another signing tool. {count} is the number of files to be signed. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.
{path} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.
{path} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.
{path} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.
{path} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.
{count} is the number of files to be signed. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: An unspecified error occurred during VSIX signing.
trans-unit.target: Während der VSIX-Signierung ist ein nicht spezifizierter Fehler aufgetreten.

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred while attempting to delete directory {path}.
trans-unit.target: Beim Versuch, das Verzeichnis {path} zu löschen, ist eine Ausnahme aufgetreten.
trans-unit.note: {path} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.
{milliseconds} is a decimal number representing the number of milliseconds elapsed, and "ms" is the unit abbreviation for milliseconds. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: Fetching certificate from Azure Key Vault.
trans-unit.target: Zertifikat wird von Azure Key Vault abgerufen.

trans-unit.note: {ContainerFilePath} is a file path and {DirectoryPath} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: {0} timed out and could not be killed.
trans-unit.target: {0} hat ein Timeout und konnte nicht abgebrochen werden.
trans-unit.note: {0} is a file path.

trans-unit.source: {fileName} took too long to respond. The process exit code is {exitCode}.
trans-unit.target: {fileName} took too long to respond. The process exit code is {exitCode}.
trans-unit.note: {fileName} is a file name and {exitCode} is a number representing the error code returned from a process. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: {0} took too long to respond. The process exit code is {1}. Arguments: {2}
trans-unit.target: {0} hat zu lange gebraucht, um zu antworten. Der Prozessexitcode ist {1}. Argumente: {2}
trans-unit.note: {0} is a file name. {1} is a process exit code. {2} is process arguments.
{fileName} is a file name and {args} is process arguments. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.target: Der Container {ContainerFilePath} wird aus {DirectoryPath} neu erstellt.
trans-unit.note: {ContainerFilePath} is a file path and {DirectoryPath} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.target: SignAsync wurde für {filePath} aufgerufen. {localFilePath} wird lokal verwendet.
trans-unit.note: {filePath} and {localFilePath} are both file paths. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: Performing attempt #{attempt} of {maxAttempts} attempts after {seconds} s.
trans-unit.target: Der Versuch #{attempt} von {maxAttempts} Versuchen wird nach {seconds} Sek. ausgeführt.
trans-unit.note: {attempt} and {maxAttempts} are numbers representing the current attempt (as a number) and the maximum allowed attempts (as a number). "s" is the unit abbreviation for seconds. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.
{0} is a file path.

trans-unit.target: Fehler beim Signieren. Versuche wurden überschritten.
Das Signieren ist mit Fehler {errorCode} fehlgeschlagen.
trans-unit.note: {errorCode} is an error code. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.
{filePath} is a file path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

{filePath} is a file path, {milliseconds} is a decimal number representing the number of milliseconds elapsed, and "ms" is the unit abbreviation for milliseconds. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.
{filePath} is a file path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: The value cannot be an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Der Wert darf keine leere Zeichenfolge sein.

trans-unit.note: {count} is the number of files to be signed. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.
